title: i have 55 MS
body: an iv littarly DC'ed 6 times ina  row an iv got NO idea why

replies.body: 55ms is pretty good, depending on where you're at, but disconnecting is definitely not normal. Can you let me know what sort of error message you see when you disconnect?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=sV7r0aUz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-14T02:54:36.129+0000)
>
> 55ms is pretty good, depending on where you're at, but disconnecting is definitely not normal. Can you let me know what sort of error message you see when you disconnect?

its not giving me any error im just Dcing constantly iv already dced fully 3 times now an i cant figure out why

This is most likely caused by your connection to the servers dropping off or becoming *very poor*. I'd recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
